mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id AND rp.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.role_id = r.id AND r.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.del_flag = 0 WHERE p.del_flag = 0 AND u.username = 'admin' ORDER BY p.sort_no ASC

SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT a.id FROM sys_role_permission a JOIN sys_role b ON a.role_id = b.id AND b.del_flag = 0 JOIN sys_user_role c ON c.role_id = b.id AND c.del_flag = 0 JOIN sys_user d ON d.id = c.user_id and d.del_flag = 0 WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND p.id = a.permission_id AND d.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND p.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_no ASC
